description: Returns details about the requested data quality metrics.

parameters.name: AnomalyDetectorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the anomaly detector that you want to investigate.

nested_items.name: AnomalyDetectorDataQualityMetricList
nested_items.description: A list of the data quality metrics for the AnomalyDetectorArn that you requested.

nested_items.name: StartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The start time for the data quality metrics collection.

nested_items.name: MetricSetDataQualityMetricList
nested_items.description: An array of DataQualityMetricList objects. Each object in the array contains information about a data quality metric.

nested_items.name: MetricSetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data quality metric array.

nested_items.name: DataQualityMetricList
nested_items.description: The array of data quality metrics contained in the data quality metric set.

nested_items.name: MetricType
nested_items.description: The name of the data quality metric.

nested_items.name: MetricDescription
nested_items.description: A description of the data quality metric.

nested_items.name: RelatedColumnName
nested_items.description: The column that is being monitored.

nested_items.name: MetricValue
nested_items.description: The value of the data quality metric.
